channel.title: Juggle Girlfriend Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle Girlfriend Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Juggling Festival and the magical mysterious...
item.description: This weekend was a good time. I juggled and yoyoed and gained a bunch of inspiration to find and make new yoyo/diabolo tricks. I found a whole new way to yoyo. Lovely. It was quite strange, I met while juggling, a friend of a friends that just happened to be the proprietor of a web site I used to frequent. weird.I also was able to see my girlfriend. Imagine, just 12 months ago I was pineing over her - trying ot get up the courage to ask her out, and now.
